children.description: The content of the accordion summary.

classes.description: Override or extend the styles applied to the component.

expandIcon.description: The icon to display as the expand indicator.

focusVisibleClassName.description:
This prop can help a person know which element has the keyboard focus.
The class name will be applied when the element gain the focus through a keyboard interaction.
It's a polyfill for the [CSS :focus-visible selector](https://drafts.csswg.org/selectors-4/#the-focus-visible-pseudo).
The rationale for using this feature [is explained here](https://github.com/WICG/focus-visible/blob/master/explainer.md).
A [polyfill can be used](https://github.com/WICG/focus-visible) to apply a `focus-visible` class to other components
if needed.

descriptions.root: Styles applied to the root element.
descriptions.expanded: Pseudo-class applied to the root element, children wrapper element and `IconButton` component if `expanded={true}`.
descriptions.focusVisible: Pseudo-class applied to the ButtonBase root element if the button is keyboard focused.
descriptions.disabled: Pseudo-class applied to the root element if `disabled={true}`.
descriptions.content: Styles applied to the children wrapper element.
descriptions.expandIconWrapper: Styles applied to the `expandIcon`'s wrapper element.
